transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine. And today we're testing out the new iPhone 12 Pro. I'm gonna take some photos and videos but first, thank you to dbrand for sponsoring this video because I just put on their new tempered glass screen protector and this thing is... It just blew my mind. New iPhones mean new dbrand skins. We also have one of their cases but we also have something new, we have their new tempered glass screen protector. And why this is very exciting is because the new iPhone 12 is a completely flat display. It will allow for some very precise placement of the screen protectors. You might be saying Justine 'Yeah, but the new iPhone 12 has new Ceramic Shield which is four times stronger than the previous iPhone 11.' Yes, it is but it is about the same as far as scratch resistance, so I do not wanna make the same mistake I did last year by not putting a screen protector on mine. So we're starting off this iPhone 12 right. I mean they even give you a little screen bubble pusher. (upbeat music) (upbeat music continues) - Wow! This is perfect. (knife scratching) - Oh my God, it's not even scratching it at all. I just thought okay I'll stab it and if it does scratch it, cool, great, I have another one. I'll put that one on. I'm so impressed. Let's get a case on this thing. (upbeat music) - Oh, hear that! That looks good. Oh, did you need to dbrand your MagSafe? You could do that too. That's great. Okay, back or not, oh it's a little windy. Back on Life on Tyler's here. Hi Tyler. And like I've said before, the biggest difference between the 12 and the 12 Pro is the 12 does not have a telephoto lens and you could only shoot in 30 fps as opposed to the 60 frames Dolby Vision HDR. So, let's go take some photos and videos, yes? I still got a sprained ankle so we'll take this real slow. It is so beautiful. It just rained so it feels so fresh, it's so fresh. What is that? Is that a person or is that a... That is a person's feet, are they flipping? Yes, they're doing some sort of activity. (upbeat music) (upbeat music continues) - Should we take a picture of these people? One thing I wouldn't be able to do if I was shooting this on the 12 is there's no telephoto, but we'll be able to see them. (upbeat music) (upbeat music continues) (upbeat music continues) - I'm using the OSMO Mobile 4 to stabilize my shot as I'm walking. It already has really incredible stabilization but just having this added gimbal to get these shots makes it look so much cooler. One thing that I am excited to show you guys though is the difference between HDR footage on the 12 Pro and the 11, because right now you're not actually able to see the HDR because I'm exporting this video on STR. But when you are really taking this into final cut, you're able to see the color detail, you're able to see how much more color you... It's windy again! They just asked who I was talking to. I'm talking to my friends on YouTube. So because I'm posting this on YouTube it is an STR clip You're not gonna really be able to see the difference but when you do take this into final cut and comparing the footage between the 12 and the 11, there is such a huge difference because you have so much more color detail, you have the ability to bring up and down the highlights so much more than you could in the non-HDR footage. So a lot of you guys keep saying 'but it looks the same' I promise you, as someone who has edited this video and other ones, it is not the same. (upbeat music) - The front-facing camera's also amazing because they have added an update to this so you'll be able to do front-facing Night Mode which is kinda cool. I haven't really got to test it out as much as I'd like. I did a little bit but sometimes when it's really dark, I just use the flash to get a good selfie but the fact that they've added Night Mode on all of these lenses is pretty cool. Speechless. (waves rolling) - It just takes a good photo every single time That's a nice photo. That's a nice photo. That's wasn't a nice photo. (upbeat music) (upbeat music continues) (upbeat music continues) - [Justine] Hey bird! (upbeat music) - Everything in Ultra Wide just looks terrifying. This looks like I'm at the Grand Canyon right now. I'm not. Spoiler! (upbeat music) (upbeat music continues) - Let's get that wide angle. I found a rock, it's pretty. (soft music) - It's nighttime which means it's Night Mode time. Night Mode is available on every single camera on the iPhone 12, and it's only on the wide angle on the iPhone 11. The sun just went down. It's not really dark enough to really show you guys how incredible Night Mode... You are going to shut up. You're going to shut your mouth now. (laughing) Obviously Night Mode hand held is pretty good but the tripod Night Mode is where this really shines. Let's go find some darkness. Not that I don't love the industrial roof or anything.
